===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=こんごう}} compound {{m|zh|金剛|tr=kim kang|lit=metal + strong, hard}}. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''gam<sup>1</sup> gong<sup>1</sup>''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=on|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR|こんごう}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こんごう|hhira=こんがう}}

# [[Buddhist]] term of '''''[[vajra|Vajra]]''''', literally meaning both "'''''[[diamond|Diamond]]'''''" & "'''''[[thunderbolt|Thunderbolt]]'''''," referring to the symbolic nature of both that of a diamond, (in that it can cut any substance, but can not, itself, be cut,) and that of the thunderbolt, (an irresistible force)
# the [[firmness]] of one's own [[spirit]], and the strength of one's own [[spiritual]] power
# {{lb|ja|sort=こんごう|Buddhism}} short for {{ja-r|金剛杵|こんごうしょ}}: a [[vajra]], a [[dorje]]: a kind of double-headed [[scepter]] used in [[esoteric]] [[Buddhism]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=こんごう|figuratively|literally}} something extremely hard, of extreme strength
# short for {{ja-r|金剛石|こんごうせき}}: [[diamond]] as a [[mineral]] or [[gemstone]]
